ACE04 dataset.to analyze: effectiveness of the various parts of our joint model

on.from sentence: We conduct ablation tests on the ACE04 dataset reported in to analyze the effectiveness of the various parts of our joint model .

performance of.from sentence: The performance of the RE task decreases ( ? 1 % in terms of F 1 score ) when we remove the label embeddings layer and only use the LSTM hidden states as inputs for the RE task .

Removing.from sentence: Removing character embeddings also degrades the performance of both NER ( ? 1 % ) and RE ( ? 2 % ) tasks by a relatively large margin .

for.from sentence:
Finally , we conduct experiments for the NER task by removing the CRF loss layer and substituting it with a softmax .
Assuming independent distribution of labels ( i.e. , softmax ) leads to a slight decrease in the F 1 performance of the NER module and a ? 2 % decrease in the performance of the RE task .
